statements: DELETE FROM hospital_admission_data WHERE patient_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM hospital_admission_data WHERE patient_id = 101 AND admission_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM hospital_admission_data WHERE diagnosis_code = 'COVID19' AND patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM diagnoses WHERE diagnosis_id IN (SELECT diagnosis_id FROM patients WHERE admission_date < '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM Diagnoses WHERE diagnosis_date BETWEEN '2020-06-01' AND '2020-12-31';
